column4: Hi, I am just trying to enable xfowarding in KARMIC. but I cannot find anywhere any settings neiher in gconftool-2 nor in he 'mighty' gui. HELP Please..
if you use openssh-server   xforwarding is enabled by default
just connect with: ssh -X user@host     and you will be able to run x forwarded apps
Thanks for the help! That went quick :)
